hero.description: Track every inspection, maintain compliance, and keep your workplace safe with real-time visibility into your safety equipment.

contact.title: Let’s Talk Safety
contact.description: Have questions about AmanTrack? Our team is here to help you streamline compliance and asset management.

cta.title: Ready to transform your safety management?
cta.description: Join forward-thinking organizations using AmanTrack to maintain compliance and protect their teams.

dashboard.title: Built for clarity and control
dashboard.description: A clean, intuitive interface that puts critical safety information at your fingertips.

features.title: Everything you need to manage safety
features.description: Powerful features designed for HSE professionals to streamline operations and ensure workplace safety.

assetManagement.title: Asset Management
assetManagement.desc: Track all safety assets with inspection schedules and compliance status.

inspectionTracking.title: Inspection Tracking
inspectionTracking.desc: Log inspections, reminders, and compliance deadlines.

realTimeReports.title: Real-time Reports
realTimeReports.desc: Generate audit-ready PDF and CSV reports instantly.

smartAlerts.title: Smart Alerts
smartAlerts.desc: Automated alerts for expired assets and inspections.

stats.title: Trusted by safety teams
stats.description: Join organizations that have transformed their safety management with AmanTrack.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Choose a plan that fits your organization’s size and compliance needs.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for small teams getting started with safety tracking.

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: Advanced tools for growing HSE teams.

problemSolution.title: From Chaos to Compliance
problemSolution.description: Many organizations struggle with manual safety tracking. AmanTrack transforms complex compliance workflows into a simple, centralized system.

items.paper: Paper-based inspection records get lost or damaged.
items.missed: Missed inspections lead to compliance risks.
items.manual: Manual tracking wastes time and reduces productivity.
items.visibility: Lack of real-time visibility across teams.

informationCollected.title: 1. Information We Collect
informationCollected.content: AmanTrack collects account information, asset records, inspection data, and usage analytics necessary to provide compliance tracking services.

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Information
howWeUse.content: Data is used to operate the platform, improve performance, ensure compliance monitoring, and provide customer support.

dataProtection.title: 3. Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement industry-standard security practices to protect your data against unauthorized access or disclosure.

thirdParty.title: 4. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: AmanTrack may use secure third-party services for hosting, analytics, and payment processing.

contact.title: 5. Contact
contact.content: For privacy-related inquiries, contact us at contact@amantrack.com.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using AmanTrack, you agree to comply with these terms and all applicable laws and regulations.

account.title: 2. Account Responsibility
account.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and all activities under your account.

usage.title: 3. Service Usage
usage.content: The platform is intended for lawful safety compliance tracking and must not be used for illegal activities.

liability.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: AmanTrack is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from use of the service.

modifications.title: 5. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to update these terms at any time.

footer.description: Professional HSE safety equipment tracking and compliance management for modern organizations.
